attributes.action: If Over 60's Can Get Free Bus Travel, Why Can't Students?
attributes.additional_details:
All over 60's in the UK, get free bus travel, why shouldn't students?
The government is trying to get more people to use public transport, but how can we if it is to expensive ?
Most college students have no choice but to rely on buses and trains to get to their college, costing parents.
Getting a better eduction shouldn't have to be expensive.

All students should have free travel between college hours (7am-5pm) this would also encourage more students to carry on with further eduction.
